column1: Narrator : A small ship approaches NOMBATEAU. The crew is small but it looks like they carry some goods.

column6: OtherSpeak : Oh I heard some stories! People talk about heading DIRECTIONTOFORMULA.
column7: OtherSpeak : Never heard of it, sorry mate.

column8: Choice : Have ye heard of NOMTRESOR?

column1: OtherSpeak : Mostly clothing, makes for good quality protection if you have the gold for it!

column2: Choice : Show me what ye have, peddler! (trade)

column1: OtherSpeak : Weapons, blades! The best you can find!
Choice : So what do ye have to sell?
OtherSpeak : Sustenance for the hungry sailor! I’m sure you’re hungry.
OtherSpeak : Baubles and other small items, take a look!
